name: alertness
description: Increased wakefulness and mental clarity
measurement_protocol: Psychomotor Vigilance Task (PVT) and resting heart rate at baseline, 20, 120 min

name: sustained_focus
description: Extended periods of concentration without mental fatigue
measurement_protocol: 45-minute Continuous Performance Task accuracy with EEG theta/beta ratio

name: mental_clarity
description: Clear thinking and improved decision making
measurement_protocol: Stroop + Trail Making B completion times

name: creativity
description: Enhanced divergent thinking and pattern recognition
measurement_protocol: Alternative Uses Task fluency and Remote Associates Test accuracy

name: memory
description: Improved encoding and recall of information
measurement_protocol: Rey Auditory Verbal Learning Test immediate recall

name: learning
description: Enhanced information processing and retention
measurement_protocol: Paired-associate learning accuracy over 6 trials

name: energy_boost
description: Increased physical energy and reduced fatigue
measurement_protocol: Profile of Mood States (POMS) fatigue subscale + RPE during cycling

name: metabolism
description: Enhanced metabolic rate and fat oxidation
measurement_protocol: Resting energy expenditure via indirect calorimetry (metabolic cart)

name: digestion
description: Improved digestive comfort and gut health
measurement_protocol: GI comfort Likert scale and bloating score every 30 min

name: immune
description: Strengthened immune system function
measurement_protocol: Salivary IgA and lymphocyte count 4h post ingestion

name: antioxidant
description: Protection against oxidative stress and cellular damage
measurement_protocol: Plasma ORAC and 8-OHdG biomarkers

name: calm
description: Reduced anxiety and mental tension
measurement_protocol: State-Trait Anxiety Inventory (STAI-S) + HRV RMSSD

name: relaxation
description: Gentle unwinding and stress relief
measurement_protocol: Visual Analog Scale (relaxation) and surface EMG of trapezius

name: stress_relief
description: Active reduction of stress hormones and tension
measurement_protocol: Salivary cortisol and NASA-TLX workload ratings

name: mood_lift
description: Gentle elevation of mood and well-being
measurement_protocol: PANAS positive affect subscale and smile frequency tracking

name: sleep_prep
description: Preparation for restful sleep
measurement_protocol: Actigraphy-derived sleep latency + Pittsburgh Sleep Diary

name: meditation
description: Enhanced mindfulness and present-moment awareness
measurement_protocol: Mindful Attention Awareness Scale (state) + EEG alpha power

name: comfort
description: Emotional warmth and sense of well-being
measurement_protocol: Thermal comfort Likert scale and skin conductance level

name: grounding
description: Centered, present feeling of stability
measurement_protocol: Body Awareness Questionnaire and postural sway variance

name: memory_enhancement
description: Improved recall of facts, names, and complex concepts
measurement_protocol: Delayed word recall and paired-associate retention 24h later

name: working_memory
description: Greater ability to hold and manipulate information in mind
measurement_protocol: 2-back accuracy + reaction time with EEG theta power

name: long_term_memory
description: Enhanced consolidation of new material into durable storage
measurement_protocol: Rey AVLT delayed recall and recognition after 1h

name: information_processing
description: Faster pattern recognition and reaction time
measurement_protocol: Choice reaction time task and P300 latency

name: neuroplasticity
description: Support for new neural connections and learning capacity
measurement_protocol: Serum BDNF + learning curve slope on novel task

name: neuroprotection
description: Defense against oxidative and inflammatory damage in the brain
measurement_protocol: Oxidative stress markers (MDA) and inflammatory cytokines

name: learning_speed
description: Accelerated acquisition of new skills or languages
measurement_protocol: Skill acquisition slope on serial reaction task

name: mental_stamina
description: Ability to stay mentally sharp during long work sessions
measurement_protocol: Sustained attention to response task (SART) lapses over 2h

name: motivation_support
description: Positive drive to initiate and complete tasks
measurement_protocol: Intrinsic Motivation Inventory (effort/interest) + task initiation latency

name: executive_function
description: Improved planning, prioritization, and multi-step decision making
measurement_protocol: Trail Making Test Part B and Wisconsin Card Sort errors

name: stress_resilience
description: Stable performance under demanding or unpredictable conditions
measurement_protocol: Cortisol response to Trier Social Stress Test + HRV recovery

name: physical_endurance
description: Sustained energy output for athletic or long work sessions
measurement_protocol: Cycle ergometer time-to-exhaustion at 70% VO2max

name: muscle_recovery
description: Reduced soreness and faster post-exercise restoration
measurement_protocol: Perceived soreness (VAS) + serum CK 24h post exercise

name: metabolic_boost
description: Elevated calorie expenditure and lipid metabolism
measurement_protocol: Resting metabolic rate via indirect calorimetry every hour

name: thermogenesis
description: Heat-producing effect that aids fat oxidation
measurement_protocol: Postprandial energy expenditure and skin temperature

name: appetite_regulation
description: Balanced hunger cues and reduced cravings
measurement_protocol: Visual Analog Scale hunger ratings + ghrelin levels

name: digestive_health
description: Improved gut motility and microbiome support
measurement_protocol: Gastrointestinal Symptom Rating Scale and stool form

name: gut_balance
description: Stable gut-brain axis function and reduced bloating
measurement_protocol: Bristol stool scale + microbiome diversity snapshot

name: immune_support
description: Activation of innate and adaptive immune defenses
measurement_protocol: Natural killer cell activity and salivary IgA

name: cardiovascular_support
description: Healthy circulation, endothelial function, and lipid profile
measurement_protocol: Flow-mediated dilation (FMD) and resting blood pressure

name: anti_inflammatory
description: Reduced systemic inflammation markers
measurement_protocol: CRP and IL-6 levels pre/post intervention

name: antioxidant_defense
description: Neutralization of free radicals throughout the body
measurement_protocol: Glutathione peroxidase activity and isoprostane levels

name: anxiety_reduction
description: Lower perceived anxiety and improved calm vigilance
measurement_protocol: GAD-7 short form and HRV RMSSD

name: emotional_stability
description: Balanced mood with fewer swings
measurement_protocol: Daily mood variance (EMA) and PANAS balance

name: depression_relief
description: Gentle uplift in mood and hedonic tone
measurement_protocol: PHQ-9 short form administered weekly
